pr_title: removed pytest version from sanity script

timeline.message: removed pytest version from sanity script

timeline.bodyText:
IIUC, https://pypi.org/project/pytest-mock/ latest revision of 3.1.0 released April 18 2020 requires us to be on a newer version of pytest package. Without this upgrade (i.e., removing the constraint of older package) our CI/CD tests will fail.
It's best to move all the package requirements to a requirements file. Let's do that in a separate PR. Thanks.
timeline.author: mycpuorg
